column5: Great report KC!  Thanks for posting that! Someday I'll give those fish a try!
No we didn't Bunk.  I asked the guide if he has ever tried some and he told me they were not to his liking. Something about the meat being more white then pink and being a little tougher.

So you marinate it to the color, texture and taste you want. lol.  If it's good enough for Capn' Highliner to vaccuum pack, freeze and send all the way to us high society folk here in the Moose, well, it's good enough for you. lol.  EAT IT.
Awesome report guys way to go.
Wow! What scenery. Trip of a lifetime I bet. Thanks for the pics that bald eagle looks huge and that last sturgeon is giant. So jealous.  Cheers, 1leg
OH YA, great report, thanks for sharing...

Great report, just awesome.  I've been to BC a few times.  I love how the weather can just turn on a dime on you.  Maybe I'll get back there for a visit and a fish sometime soon.  Thanks for the memories.  Joey
Wow!! Amazing fish!!!  I think, at least until I get better and more experienced, that I wont fish for somthing that could literally have ME for dinner!!!!
Those are some amazing fish. Thanks for sharing with us!
Wow, great post and pics!  I hope one day I'll be able to make a trip over there for some fishing.  I'll just keep dreaming for now.  Thanks for sharing.
gotta love those sturgeon!

WOW,,,,,,KC thats an amazing fishing trip and report the scenery is like its not even real i have been to the mountains as well,those sturgeon sure put up a fantastic fight, and those salmon look incredible, way to go.....thanks for the report i wish i was there....
I can sum up my response in one word....WOW!!!  Awesome report w/ awesome fish Thanks for sharing  Gerritt
Awesome report...great pictures....Great Job!!!!!
Mind blowing.  The sturgeon are so huge they make muskie look like minnows.You have to be in shape for that kind of fishin.I wonder how far a sturgeon like that could pull your boat?
Said before and I will say it again,  WILD STUFF Bud
I AM SO JEALOUS  AWESOME REPORT GUYS AND I LOVE THE PHOTO'S  If it was not for my daughter getting married next yr i reckon i would be making plans for atrip like that tommorow. lol
It sounds like you had a nice trip. Just downstream from me from the looks of it.  outdoorguy61
WOW !  Huge fish.  Congrats. Definately a good trip for you.
That was a great report. Looks like an awesome time. Thanks for sharing..
Amazing report KC.  Beautiful scenery and great fishing.  Thanks.
Very nice !!  Thanks for sharing.
Nice Fish  And nice scenery pictures as well.
